CustomField.description: Measures the data quality score of a Person Account
CustomField.formula: IF( LEN( Phone) = 0, 0,0.20) + IF( ISPICKVAL(GenderIdentity,""), 0,0.20) + IF( LEN( Account.Primary_Shipping_Address__c ) = 0, 0,0.20)+ IF( LEN( Account.PersonEmail ) = 0, 0,0.10) + IF( LEN( Account.Primary_Billing_Address__c ) = 0, 0,0.10) + IF( LEN( Account.Bank_Account__c ) = 0, 0,0.10) + IF( ISPICKVAL(Salutation,""), 0,0.10)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Measures the data quality score of a Person Account
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score
